trans-unit.source: Enables multiple collections and items to be displayed as a single list.
trans-unit.target: 允许多个集合和项作为一个列表显示。

trans-unit.source: CompositeCollection can contain items such as strings, objects, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] nodes, elements, as well as other collections.
trans-unit.target: CompositeCollection 可以包含项例如字符串、 对象、[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)]节点、 元素，以及其他集合。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> uses the data in the CompositeCollection to generate its content according to its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>使用 CompositeCollection 来生成其<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate%2A>根据其内容中的数据</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information about using <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> objects to bind to collections, see the Binding to Collections section of the [Data Binding Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>对象要绑定到集合，请参阅绑定到集合一部分[数据绑定概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.CompositeCollection"></xref> class that is empty and has default initial capacity.
trans-unit.target: 创建的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Data.CompositeCollection"></xref>为空并且具有默认初始容量的类。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.CompositeCollection"></xref> class that is empty and has a specified initial capacity.
trans-unit.target: 创建的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Data.CompositeCollection"></xref>为空并且具有指定的初始容量的类。

trans-unit.source: The number of items that the new list is initially capable of storing.
trans-unit.target: 新列表是最初可存储的项的数目。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified item to this collection.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的项添加到此集合。

trans-unit.source: New item to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到集合的新项。

trans-unit.source: Zero-based index where the new item is added.
trans-unit.target: 添加新项位置的从零开始索引。

trans-unit.source: Clears the collection.
trans-unit.target: 清除集合。

trans-unit.source: This method resets the collection to be empty.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将重置为空集合。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the collection changes, either by adding or removing an item.
trans-unit.target: 通过添加或删除某个项而集合更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Checks to see if a given item is in this collection.
trans-unit.target: 检查给定的项是否在此集合中。

trans-unit.source: The item to check.
trans-unit.target: 要检查的项。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the collection contains the given item; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果集合包含给定的项目中;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Makes a shallow copy of object references from this collection to the given array.
trans-unit.target: 可以从此集合到给定数组的对象引用的浅表副本。

trans-unit.source: The array that is the destination of the copy operation.
trans-unit.target: 一个数组，它是复制操作的目标。

trans-unit.source: Zero-based index in the target array at which the copying starts.
trans-unit.target: 在复制开始处的目标数组的从零开始索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of items stored in this collection.
trans-unit.target: 获取此集合中存储的项的数目。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionContainer> object counts as 1 item.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionContainer>对象计数为 1 个项目。</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionContainer>

trans-unit.source: The number of items stored in this collection.
trans-unit.target: 此集合中存储的项的数目。

trans-unit.source: Returns the index in this collection where the given item is found.
trans-unit.target: 返回此集合中找到给定的项的索引。

trans-unit.source: The item to retrieve the index for.
trans-unit.target: 要检索的索引的项。

trans-unit.source: If the item appears in the collection, then the zero-based index in the collection where the given item is found; otherwise, `-1`.
trans-unit.target: 如果在集合中，则集合中的从零开始索引出现的项在其中找到给定的项;否则为`-1`。

trans-unit.source: Inserts an item in the collection at a given index.
trans-unit.target: 在集合中给定索引处插入项。

trans-unit.source: All items after the given position are moved down by one.
trans-unit.target: 给定位置之后的所有项都向下都移动一个。

trans-unit.source: The index to insert the item at.
trans-unit.target: 要插入处的项的索引。

trans-unit.source: The item reference to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到集合的项引用。

trans-unit.source: If index is out of range.
trans-unit.target: 如果索引超出范围。

trans-unit.source: Indexer property that retrieves or replaces the item at the given zero-based offset in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 索引器属性，检索或替换集合中给定从零开始的偏移量处的项。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based offset of the item to retrieve or replace.
trans-unit.target: 要检索或替换的项的从零开始的偏移量。

trans-unit.source: The item at the specified zero-based offset.
trans-unit.target: 指定从零开始的偏移量处的项。

trans-unit.source: If the index is out of range.
trans-unit.target: 如果索引超出范围。

trans-unit.source: Handles events from the centralized event table.
trans-unit.target: 处理集中式的事件表中的事件。

trans-unit.source: The type of the <xref href="System.Windows.WeakEventManager"></xref> calling this method.
trans-unit.target: 一种<xref href="System.Windows.WeakEventManager"></xref>调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This only recognizes manager objects of type <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.CollectionChangedEventManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 这仅识别的类型的管理器对象<xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.CollectionChangedEventManager"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Object that originated the event.
trans-unit.target: 产生事件的对象。

trans-unit.source: Event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件数据。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the listener handled the event; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果侦听器处理路由事件。否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Removes the given item reference from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 从集合中移除给定的项的引用。

trans-unit.source: All remaining items move up by one.
trans-unit.target: 所有剩余项向上移动一个。

trans-unit.source: The item to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的项。

trans-unit.source: Removes an item from the collection at the given index.
trans-unit.target: 从给定索引处的集合中移除的项。

trans-unit.source: All remaining items move up by one.
trans-unit.target: 所有剩余项向上移动一个。

trans-unit.source: The index at which to remove an item.
trans-unit.target: 索引位置移除一个项。

trans-unit.source: If index is out of range.
trans-unit.target: 如果索引超出范围。

trans-unit.source: This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员支持[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]基础结构，不应在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: true if access to the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: true 访问<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>是同步的 （线程安全）; 否则为 false。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员支持[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]基础结构，不应在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.
trans-unit.target: 可以用于<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>对访问进行同步的对象

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个枚举。

trans-unit.source: An IEnumerator object.
trans-unit.target: 一个 IEnumerator 对象。

trans-unit.source: This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员支持[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]基础结构，不应在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Collections.IList> has a fixed size; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref:System.Collections.IList>具有固定大小; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员支持[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]基础结构，不应在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Collections.IList> is read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref:System.Collections.IList>只读的; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员支持[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]基础结构，不应在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: The view created.
trans-unit.target: 创建的视图。

trans-unit.source: This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员支持[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]基础结构，不应在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: The type of the <xref href="System.Windows.WeakEventManager"></xref> calling this method.
trans-unit.target: 一种<xref href="System.Windows.WeakEventManager"></xref>调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This only recognizes manager objects of type <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.CollectionChangedEventManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 这仅识别的类型的管理器对象<xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.CollectionChangedEventManager"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Object that originated the event.
trans-unit.target: 产生事件的对象。

trans-unit.source: Event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件数据。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the listener handled the event; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果侦听器处理路由事件。否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
